description:
ForceReinit() lines 92-97 shell out to 'git worktree remove --force' to clean up .git/beadwork/ worktrees from a previous architecture. This is no longer needed — the worktree architecture was replaced by TreeFS. Remove the cleanup block and the os.RemoveAll fallback.

TDD: verify ForceReinit still works without the worktree cleanup. Existing tests should cover this — confirm they pass.
title: Remove legacy worktree cleanup from ForceReinit
